data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Shopping Spree
data.detailed_description:
Time to hit the mall! Grab this new pack from Yeaka and build yourself a shopping palace full of fun surprises! This pack contains lots of items to fill your mall including food court signage and tables / chairs, greenery, potted plants, curtains, computer monitors, arcade games, kitchenwares, interior design, bookshelves, clothing racks, home office furnishings, and more!

Features:

* TileA2 / A4 / A5 for floor, walls etc.
* Full TileB / TileC / TileD for various items (food court signage and tables / chairs, greenery, potted plants, curtains, computer monitors, arcade games, kitchenwares, interior design, bookshelves, clothing racks, home office furnishings, and more!)
* Full TileE with pre-arranged and item-laden furniture, plus parallax sheet, ready to use!
* Character sheet with animated doors / computer and game screen / framed art / curtains / signs

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Makers or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

data.short_description: Time to go shopping! Grab this new tileset and hit the mall, filed with fun items and places to fill your urban dream shopping center!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
